title: Group-Based Project Learning for Collaborative Science Task Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and team project experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid program for learners aged 40+ (managers/leaders) using digital devices, focusing on enhancing collaborative task design competencies in scientific fields

learning_goals: Learners can utilize strategies to facilitate creative idea generation (brainstorming) within a group.
Learners can improve collaboration efficiency by over 30% by clearly establishing task allocation criteria.
Learners can produce project outcomes applying a collective approach to scientific problem-solving.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
